00020 
00021 using Gtk;
00022 using Glade;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Network;
00026 
00027 using NyFolder;
00028 using NyFolder.GUI;
00029 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00030 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.Talk {
00033     public class TalkWithDialog : GladeDialog {
00034         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.ComboBox comboPeers;
00035         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.VBox vboxMain;
00036         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Dialog dialog;
00037         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Image image;
00038 
00039         public TalkWithDialog() :
00040             base("dialog", new XML(null, "TalkWithDialog.glade", "dialog", null))
00041         {
00042             this.comboPeers = ComboBox.NewText();
00043             this.vboxMain.PackStart(this.comboPeers, false, false, 2);
00044 
00045             // Add Peers
00046             if (P2PManager.KnownPeers != null) {
00047                 foreach (UserInfo userInfo in P2PManager.KnownPeers.Keys)
00048                     this.comboPeers.AppendText(userInfo.Name);
00049             }
00050 
00051             this.image.Pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("TalkBubble");
00052             this.dialog.ShowAll();
00053         }
00054 
00055         public string GetPeerSelected() {
00056             TreeIter iter;
00057             if (comboPeers.GetActiveIter(out iter))
00058                 return((string) comboPeers.Model.GetValue(iter, 0));
00059             return(null);
00060         }
00061     }
00062 }
